abstract: The governance recommendations that were released as part of a report from JPMorgan Chase are highly relevant across corporate America, not just financial institutions, the author writes.
snippet: The governance recommendations that were released as part of a report from JPMorgan Chase are highly relevant across corporate America, not just financial institutions, the author writes.
lead_paragraph: Michael W. Peregrine, a partner at the law firm McDermott Will & Emery, advises corporations, officers and directors on issues related to corporate governance, fiduciary duties and internal investigations.

headline.main: For Corporate Boards, Lessons From JPMorgan’s Trading Disaster
